TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SynchronizationScopeActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity implements class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a section of workflow that requires controlled access to shared variables. If two or more instances of a SynchronizationScopeActivity access the same variables, then the execution of these activities is effectively serialized. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates creating a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SynchronizationScopeActivity> object. This example is from the Nested Exception Handlers SDK sample. For more information, see [Nested Exception Handlers Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a collection of strings that represents handles that determine the synchronization behavior of this . When two or more activities share a synchronization handle, they execute in a serial fashion; there is no interleaved execution of the child activities within them.
Docs.value: A multiline string that contains synchronization handles for this instance.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates setting the SynchronizationHandles property. This example is from the Nested Exception Handlers SDK sample. For more information, see [Nested Exception Handlers Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265).
